conbody.p: The snapshot export/import feature allows a user (or more specifically an admin) to save the data in a region and later on to load that data into a region. The snapshot may be taken on one distributed system and loaded into another distributed system. A typical usage would be to capture data from a production system and move it into a smaller QA or development system. Another usage would be to capture the state of a system at known points in time that can be easily reloaded.

The snapshot file contains all of the data from a particular region. The snapshot is a binary file that can be directly imported into a region or read entry-by-entry for further processing or transformation into other formats.
